titleStmt.title: Proclamation for putting former acts and proclamations anent beggars in execution
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Eliot, Gilbert, Sir, 1651-1718.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: "Per actum dominorum secreti concilii, Gilb. Eliot, cis. sti. concilii."
"Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the last day of July. And of our reign the sixth year, 1694."
Royal coat of arms at head of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
